nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence

Class LevelFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence.LevelFactory

  • public class LevelFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Level Factory class created to read in JSON file formats based on a level token, which is then passed to application

    Mike - Creator
